mapper.select: SELECT customer_id customerId , first_name firstName , last_name lastName , email email FROM customer WHERE ACTIVE = 1 AND LOWER(CONCAT(first_name, last_name)) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchName}),'%')

SELECT customer_id customerId , store_id storeId , first_name firstName , last_name lastName , address_id addressId , email , create_date createDate , last_update lastUpdate FROM customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
